name: Bygone Melodies
description:
Can you still remember them?

As I was sitting on my favorite bench one day, when something curious happened. The clock on the townhall suddenly stopped dead in its track. However unusual that is, I had some time think about the past. My adventures and misadventures - they all came alive before my eyes like it happened yesterday. 

Back in those days - me and my guitar were the greatest friends. 

What happened to us?

         Controls: 

  • Interact: Enter / space
  • Moves: [ Z and X ] or [ keyboard arrows Left and Right] or [ A and D ]
  • Pause: Escape
  • (PC version; Fullscreen: F11)

Made with Godot for the 51st Ludum Dare game jam (2022)

Save Sloth Studios
(Kornelille & Almam)
